Cosentino Colors Silestone Charcoal Soapstone

Charcoal Soapstone

Silestone - Eternal

Description:

Inspired by the popular soap stone, this colour has a blue-grey finish with powerful, grey highlights. A spectacular creation, characterised by its rotundity, depth and sense of movement.

Technology

Certificates

Silestone reduces silica content

All Silestone slabs carry the label indicating the crystalline silica content in its composition. The Q10 and Q40 markers indicate the percentage of crystalline silica.

Discover Hybriq+

+ Finishes Available

Polished
More vibrant and intense colors and reflections
Suede
Soft and pleasant feel with full color consistency

+ Thicknesses

2,0 cm
3,0 cm

+ Format

128.74 x 62.60 in

Why you should choose Silestone Charcoal Soapstone

Silestone is a hybrid surface of minerals and recycled materials which can bring colour and texture to your space. Thanks to its exclusive and innovative HybriQ + technology, maintenance is minimal and high resistance to stains and scratches is guaranteed.
Since its creation, Silestone has set major trends in its market, transforming the world of kitchen countertops becoming a benchmark in interior design. Once again, we evolve.
View more

The benefits of Silestone

High scratch resistance

Daily use and wear will not scratch Silestone.

Stain-resistant

Its low porosity makes it highly resistant to stains.

High impact resistance

Highly resistant to daily impacts.

Acid-resistant

Silestones low porosity prevents it from being damaged by harsh stains.

Combine Charcoal Soapstone like a pro

Make your own combination of materials with our digital moodboard application.

Go to Moodboard App
